question: Over 44 lakh tonnes of food grains were taken by the States and UTs under which scheme?
option2: Pradhan Mantri Garib Kalyan Anna Yojana-2
answer: Pradhan Mantri Garib Kalyan Anna Yojana-2
explanation:
As per a recent statement by the Union Consumer Affairs Ministry, over 44 lakh tonnes food grains were lifted by States and Union Territories till date.
The food grains were taken under Pradhan Mantri Garib Kalyan Anna Yojana-2. Under the scheme, around 201 lakh tonnes food grains will be distributed among 81 crore beneficiaries. The scheme has been implemented from July 1 will be implemented till November 2020.
